name: Bugz (Bluescreen Studios)
description:
Play as the Bugz kid, traversing around a dark dungeon infested with evil Bugz to collect your homework back.

Featuring randomly-generated rooms, 2d platforming gameplay, and other features!

Designed and Programmed by Trace McLaurin

Produced by Mo Polonsky

Art by Katie Miles and John Wright

Additional Programming by Nico Omenetto
